tours.name: Central & Eastern Europe Highlights
tours.info: Start in Rome and end in London! With the Explorer tour Get Social: Central & Eastern Europe Highlights, you have a 16 days tour package taking you through Rome, Italy and 9 other destinations in Europe. Get Social: Central & Eastern Europe Highlights includes accommodationin a hosteland campsites as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.

tours.name: Europe Escape - 12 Days
tours.info: Start and end in Rome! With the Explorer tour Europe Escape - 12 Days, you have a 12 days tour package taking you through Rome, Italy and 15 other destinations in Europe. Europe Escape - 12 Days includes accommodation, an expert guide, meals, transport and more.

tours.name: Genuine Europe
tours.info: Start in Rome and end in London! With the In-depth Cultural tour Genuine Europe, you have a 12 days tour package taking you through Rome, Italy and 13 other destinations in Europe. Genuine Europe includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, transport.

tours.name: The Best of Eastern Europe
tours.info: Start in Berlin and end in Budapest! With the In-depth Cultural tour The Best of Eastern Europe, you have a 14 days tour package taking you through Berlin, Germany and 5 other destinations in Europe. The Best of Eastern Europe includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.

tours.name: European Delight
tours.info: Start in Rome and end in Paris! With the Explorer tour European Delight, you have a 16 days tour package taking you through Rome, Italy and 17 other destinations in Europe. European Delight includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, insurance, meals, transport and more.

tours.name: Balkan Discovery
tours.info: Start and end in Sofia! With the In-depth Cultural tour Balkan Discovery, you have a 10 days tour package taking you through Sofia, Bulgaria and 11 other destinations in Europe. Balkan Discovery includes accommodation in a hotel as well as an expert guide, meals, transport and more.
